content: HomeBlogAhmet Melih Çelikçi SEO Executive, SEMTR Ahmet Melih Çelikçi Ahmet Melih Çelikçi is an SEO Executive based in Istanbul. He has experience guiding both corporate and e-commerce companies with their technical, content and off-page strategies to grow their visibility and revenue. By examining the behavior of search engines, he strives to find the best strategy for both users and bots. He currently works for SEMTR, the first and largest independent Data Driven Marketing Agency in Turkey.
